__e: No matter how smart they think they are, they always screw up somehow.
Man, they shoot themselves in the foot... every single time they get in this position.
They screw up and then they expect you to fix it.
He's important to us, so don't screw this up.
The second they start making progress, they screw up. Because deep down, they think it's only a matter of time until they fail.
Now, do it and don't screw up.
He's important to us, so don't screw this up.
The second they start making progress, they screw up. Because deep down, they think it's only a matter of time until they fail.
Now, do it and don't screw up.
One day he will screw up a test. If they don't accuse him of that because they like him, Someone could die.
If we fail and they take the ship, we're as good as dead.
And I'm really sorry if I made you feel uncomfortable or did anything you didn't want to do.
